protein.specific_function: Probable adapter protein that bind to and organize the subcellular localization of a variety of membrane proteins containing some PDZ recognition sequence. Involved in the clustering of various receptors, possibly by acting at the receptor internalization level. May be regulated upon PRKCA activation. May regulate ACCN3-ACCN2 heteromeric cation channel
